name: City Police Bike Mission
description:
City Police Bike Mission is an exciting city sheriff heavy bike driving simulator game. You can drive the police motor-bike in heavy traffic to perform exciting, amazing ride and maintain furious speeds like nitro boosts. Your job as a traffic police officer is to chase & arrest the city gangsters to be the best police motorbike driver.
Features:

• Police Bike Gangster Car Chasing Missions
• Police Sargent Heavy Bikes Driving & Drifting
• Find, Identify and Chase city criminals
• Extreme Thrilling and Challenging Missions
• Interesting Game Play in Amazing City Environment
• Smooth and Intuitive Controls of Police Heavy Bike
